texts.optionsList: List paths starting with given branch(es), or none for root list
texts.optionsBrowser: Show information about this browser, or list ids if none
texts.optionsIndex: Show this index from a multiple result list
texts.optionsNoChildren: Don't show children object in table
texts.optionsFuzzy: Use fuzzy method for search term
texts.optionsHistory: List version history entries per browser.
texts.optionsDesc: Show description of the feature (if any)
texts.optionsNoObsolete: Hide obsolete, non-standard and deprecated child features.
texts.optionsColumns: Define custom columns using valid browser ids (see -b)
texts.optionsUpdate: Update data from remote if available
texts.optionsForceUpdate: Force update full data-set from remote
texts.optionsRandom: Show a random entry within optional scope
texts.optionsMaxChars: Max number of chars per line before wrap
texts.optionsSet: Set key/value for config file. Use ? to list valid keys.
texts.optionsConfigPath: Show path to where config file and cache is stored
texts.optionsLang: Language code for UI and descriptions. Use ? to see list.
texts.historyHint: Use option ?c-y, --history?R to see historical data.
texts.descHint: Use option ?c--desc?R to get a short description of the feature.
texts.filterHint: Add additional search terms to filter result list.
texts.someHints: Use full format to see details
texts.listBranch: Branch (not a feature, no direct sub-features)
texts.hasMergedAnother: This has been merged in another
texts.addOptionIndex: Add option '-i <n>' to list a specific feature using the same search.
texts.noArgListsId: No argument lists all valid IDs
texts.invalidColumnIds: Invalid browser id in custom columns.
texts.notFeatureObject: Not a feature object or parent to feature(s). Also see the '--list' option.
texts.criticalDataFile:
Critical error: data file not found.
?yTry running with option --fupdate to download latest snapshot.
texts.missingModule: Critical: A core module seem to be missing. Use 'npm i -g mdncomp' to reinstall.
texts.unhandled:
*** An unhandled error occurred!
Please consider reporting to help us solve it via GitLab:
https://gitlab.com/epistemex/mdncomp/issues

Try update/reinstall 'npm i -g mdncomp' (or --fupdate) if the issue persists.
